org.eclipse.actf.mediator

Interface IMediatorEventListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IACTFReportGenerator, IACTFReportViewer, IVisualizationView

    public interface IMediatorEventListener
extends EventListener
    This listener interface may be implemented in order to receive a MediatorEvent notification when a Mediator detects a status change in ACTF components.
    See Also:
    Mediator.addMediatorEventListener(IMediatorEventListener), Mediator.removeMediatorEventListener(IMediatorEventListener)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void modelserviceChanged(MediatorEvent event)
      This method is called when a model service was selected by user.
      void modelserviceInputChanged(MediatorEvent event)
      This method is called when an input change event was occured in the active model service.
      void reportChanged(MediatorEvent event)
      This method is called when the report (IACTFReport) was submitted to the Mediator
      void reportGeneratorChanged(MediatorEvent event)
      This method is called when a report generator (IACTFReportGenerator) was selected by user.
